paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR variant Leu58Arg (p.Leu78Arg) including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: ATTRv amyloidosis with sensory, motor, and autonomic neuropathy symptoms

individual_records.phenotype_details: Gradual deterioration of sensory, motor, and autonomic neuropathy symptoms after liver transplantation.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This patient showed gradual deterioration of sensory, motor, and autonomic neuropathy symptoms after LT.

functional_data.summary: The patient showed deterioration of symptoms despite treatment, indicating a complex response to therapies.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was identified in a family with a history of ATTRv amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had a long clinical course of 21 years, including a 9-year follow-up after liver transplantation.
key_quotes: The present patient had clinical manifestations of both affected members with a longer clinical course.
Although the present case showed deterioration of the symptoms after disease-modifying treatments, LT might be suitable in patients with the same variant if they are young and in good condition.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant was extracted from the main text.
